abstract: Los Angeles Galaxy defeat New York Red Bulls, 1-0, in second-round playoff series opener; Galaxy midfielder Rafael Marquez is red-carded for throwing a punch during postgame scuffle.
snippet: The Red Bulls will be without midfielder Rafael Marquez, who was red-carded for throwing a punch in a postgame melee.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls will be without midfielder Rafael Marquez, who was red-carded for throwing a punch in a postgame melee.

headline.main: Red Bulls Lose to Galaxy and Then Lose Marquez
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Lose to Galaxy And Then Lose Marquez
headline.seo: Galaxy Beat Red Bulls in First Leg of Playoff Series
